mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SFM_COMMUNITY (CNUM, CSUBJECT, CNAME, CCONTENT, CFILE, MEMNUM, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{cnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.CNUM CNUM ,A.CSUBJECT CSUBJECT ,A.CNAME CNAME ,A.CCONTENT CCONTENT ,A.CFILE CFILE ,A.MEMNUM MEMNUM ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE FROM SFM_COMMUNITY A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.CNUM = #{cnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE SFM_COMMUNITY SET CNUM = #{cnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSUBJECT = #{csubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNAME = #{cname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CCONTENT = #{ccontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFILE = #{cfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMNUM = #{memnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND CNUM = #{cnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
